alert.note: Alert for Coastal Collier County; Glades; Hendry; Inland Broward County; Inland Collier County; Inland Palm Beach County; Metro Broward County; Metro Palm Beach County; Metropolitan Miami Dade (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued September 27 at 4:03AM EDT until further notice by NWS Miami
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT THROUGH THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...All of South Florida * WHEN...Now through Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. Flooding may occur in poor drainage and urban areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - A fairly widespread 1 to 3 inches of rain has fallen across south Florida over the past 24 hours with several more bands of heavy rain expected through Thursday morning. Widespread average additional rain amounts of 4 to 6 inches are forecast with isolated higher amounts up to double those values not out of the question. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be alert for possible Flood Warnings. Those living in areas prone to flooding should be prepared to take action should flooding develop.
